page.title: 12BORDON TRADING ESTATE
page.content: Bordon Trading Estate was established in the early 1970s. Among the units there will be found some fence made of railway track and sleepers; the old station house and the old railway path plus some track. These remind us of the Bordon to Bentley Railway which was closed in 1968. Here are some of the manufacturing units: Plasplant Machinery Ltd Marine Equipment Ltd Nodus Furniture Ltd Chessington Tyres Ltd Smith's Packaging Ltd A.Reid manufacturing Ltd Yuthane Ltd King and Co Ltd Clare and Co Ltd Emberson and Co Ltd Printed Motors Ltd John Hine Ltd Advance Services Southern Ltd
